protocol.name: P-G12316-1
protocol.text: Followed Affymetrix experimental procedure. One cycle cDNA sysnthesis with 10 micro gram of Total RNA was used.

protocol.name: P-G12316-2
protocol.text: MAS 5.0, normalized with Microarray suite using seedling data as a baseline

protocol.name: P-G12316-3
protocol.text: 6hrs after the inoculation on the pollen tube media at 25°C (13.5% sucrose, 10 mM CaCl2, 0.4 mM boric acid, 1 mM KCl, 0.001% myo-inositol, and 0.6% agarose), germinating pollen was collected (1)Grinded in the mortar (2) Extracted with Isogene (Nippone gene) (3) LiCl percipitaiton (4) RNeasy purification (Qiagen)

protocol.name: P-G12316-4
protocol.text: MAS 5.0, normalized with Microarray Suite using seedling data as a baseline

protocol.name: P-G12316-5
protocol.text: 6hrs after the inoculation on the pollen tube media at 25°C (13.5% sucrose, 10mM CaCl2, 0.4 mM boric acid , 1 mM KCl, 0.001% myo-inositol, and 0.6% agarose), germianting pollen was collected. (1)Grinded in the mortar (2) Extracted with Isogene (Nippone gene) (3) LiCl percipitaiton (4) RNeasy purification (Qiagen)

protocol.name: P-G12316-6
protocol.text: Followed Affymetrix instructions, using one cycle cDNA labeling with 10 micro gram of Total RNA.

protocol.name: P-G12316-7
protocol.text: MAS 5.0, normalized with germinating pollen with pollen tube in Microarray suite. This seedling data was used as a baseline probe set.

protocol.name: P-G12316-8
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings with one rosette leave (1)Grinded in the mortar (2) Extracted with Isogene (Nippone Gene) (3) RNesy purification (Qiagen)
